LanguageData.Bumber_DebuffCombat.label: umbrella combat encumbrance
LanguageData.Bumber_DebuffCombat.description: Worse accuracy and aiming speed while using an umbrella to block sunlight or weather.
LanguageData.Bumber_DebuffWork.label: umbrella work encumbrance
LanguageData.Bumber_DebuffWork.description: Reduced work speed while using an umbrella to block sunlight or weather.
